item.title: [snc] Kill Shot
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target attacking creature.

item.title: [snc] Revelation of Power
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it has a counter on it, it also gains flying and lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] Majestic Metamorphosis
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target artifact or creature becomes a 4/4 Angel artifact creature and gains flying.

Draw a card.

item.title: [snc] Sewer Crocodile
item.description:
Creature — Crocodile

{3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [snc] Run Out of Town
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

item.title: [snc] Corrupt Court Official
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

When Corrupt Court Official enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

item.title: [snc] Antagonize
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +4/+3 until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] Daring Escape
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.

item.title: [snc] Exhibition Magician
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Exhibition Magician enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [snc] Crooked Custodian
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Rogue

Crooked Custodian enters the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [snc] Inspiring Overseer
item.description:
Creature — Angel Cleric

Flying

When Inspiring Overseer enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [snc] Undercover Operative
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter Rogue

You may have Undercover Operative enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it enters with a shield counter on it if you control that creature. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

https://dotesports.com/mtg/news/mtg-streets-of-new-capenna-undercover-operative

item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

Voice of the Vermin enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

Whenever Voice of the Vermin attacks, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.

item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [snc] Meeting of the Five
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top ten cards of your library. You may cast spells with exactly three colors from among them this turn. Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with exactly three colors.

item.title: [snc] Sanctuary Warden
item.description:
Creature — Angel Soldier

Flying

Sanctuary Warden enters the battlefield with two shield counters on it.

Whenever Sanctuary Warden enters the battlefield or attacks, you may remove a counter from a creature or planeswalker you control. If you do, draw a card and create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

item.title: [ncc] Swindler's Scheme
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a spell from their hand, you may reveal the top card of their library. If it shares a card type with that spell, counter that spell and that opponent may cast the revealed card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [ncc] Swindler's Scheme
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a spell from their hand, you may reveal the top card of their library. If it shares a card type with that spell, counter that spell and that opponent may cast the revealed card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [snc] Citizen's Crowbar
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Citizen's Crowbar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token, then attach Citizen's Crowbar to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Citizen's Crowbar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment."

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
